content.p: Grow your professional and personal networks and connect with alumni and academics around the world. Find out more about our global alumni community and how you can connect with your local networks. Below you can find details for local groups, meet our International Alumni Ambassadors in your region and take a look at our events programme to discover our international alumni activities. Our International Alumni Ambassadors help establish and grow local alumni networks, as well as providing support for our international alumni events. If you would like more information about becoming an International Alumni Ambassador, please contact our team. Take a look at our exclusive events programme to discover our international alumni activities. If there are any groups which are not listed here, you want to set up a local network, or if you need help getting in touch with a particular group, our International Volunteering and Advocacy team are available to help.
